A version of "''Minecraft alpha''" ([[Java Edition Classic Alpha]]) was released on May 16, 2009, at 16:25 UTC,<ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:25:56) notch: dock, fartron: New version, reload the page.''</ref> which fixed some bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed texture issues.<ref name='Fixes'>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:31:15) fartron: ok, close and reopen of firefox brought back textures and got invert working''</ref>
* Fixed mouse invert not working.<ref name='Fixes'/>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* A couple of issues with this version reported by the three testers were low sensitivity<ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:31:24) fartron: but now sensitivity is way low''</ref><ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:31:42) Jrsquee: and sensitivity for mouselook is almost nothing'' [...] ''(12:31:46) Jrsquee: like, real slow''</ref> and low FPS.<ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:31:30) Jrsquee: I'm getting like 8 fps''</ref> Notch also reported having issues with mouse looking.<ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:27:26) notch: dock: Whoa, I just got the horrible mouse look myself''</ref><ref>[[#logs|TigIRC logs]]: ''(12:38:17) notch: this mouse look thing is weeeeeeird''</ref>
